patthana15.58:1.1: Savicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.58:2.1: Savicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
